means: 意第绪语，依地语（犹太人使用的国际语）

sentence.Network_en: I couldn't read or understand a word of Yiddish, so I asked him to translate.
sentence.Network_cn: 我根本不懂意第绪语，所以请他来翻译。

sentence.Network_en: I will not write down his real name even in this bothersome Yiddish - letter cipher.
sentence.Network_cn: 即使是用难以辨认的意弟绪语字母的密码,我也不愿意在这里写下他的真实姓名.

sentence.Network_en: Shvitzer - Yiddish: someone who sweats a lot, especially a nervous seducer.
sentence.Network_cn: 依地语: 一个汗如雨下的人, 尤指一个紧张的玩弄女人者.

list.abs: yiddish policemen ' s union , the ., 犹太警察联盟.

encyclopedia.content: yiddish名词 意第绪语 （德语方言中参有古希伯来语和斯拉夫语：为东欧、美国等的犹太人所用） 现代英汉综合大辞典Yiddish ['jidiʃ] n. 依地语锛堃恢钟烫镲級 现代英汉词典Yiddish ['jdʃ] n. 意第绪语（犹太人使用的国际语） 词性变化 adj. 意第绪语的 简明英汉词典Yiddish ['jidiʃ] n. 意第绪语，依地语锛堄烫耸褂玫墓视镲級 adj. 意第绪语的，依地语，<俚>犹太人的

entry.tran: 意第绪语，依地语（主要为欧洲犹太人使用的一种语言）
entry.def: Yiddish is a language which comes mainly from German and is spoken by many Jewish people of European origin.

means.word_mean: 1. a dialect of High German including some Hebrew and other words; spoken in Europe as a vernacular by many Jews; written in the Hebrew script

auth_sentence.content: The politicals babbled in the Yiddish of their pamphlets.

auth_sentence.content: But Yiddish culture was disappearing even before the Holocaust.

auth_sentence.content: Fortunately for Yiddish, Strigler's energy is legion.
